ticket.title: Node identity primitives: node_fingerprint derivation + boundary_id configuration + stable emission into LaneProfileV1

in_scope: Implement node_fingerprint derivation and persistence (stable across restarts; changes only on explicit reset).
Ensure broker and worker consistently use same boundary_id.

steps: Define fingerprint inputs and persistence path.
Update LaneProfileV1 writer and broker config.

criteria: Receipts and lane profiles include stable node_fingerprint and boundary_id; RFC-0029 evaluation uses it consistently.
